title.narrative: PASR - Programme d'Appui au Secteur Rural

description.narrative:
The Danish support to the agricultural sector in Niger contributes to improved conditions for the agricultural production with a particular focus on the poor regions of Zinder and Diffa in Eastern Niger. The programme comprises two components.
One component will contribute to the development and implementation of a more coherent policy for the agricultural sector. Improved integration of i.a. women's rights into national policies and action plans is an important element of this support. At the same time the capacity will be strengthened in the ministries involved in the agricultural sector, as well as in Niger's Chamber of Agriculture, which should better represent the farmers' interests.
The other component is targetted the farmers in the rural areas of the two very underdeveloped regions in order to support the transition from subsistence agriculture to a more modern production integrated in the local economy. This will take place through investments in production chains (supply of seeds, fertilizers, advisory services for the production, processing and marketing). Improved security of land rights, the planting of dune areas on the edge of the desert and the strengthening of municipalities so that they can make available the infrastructure that the farmers need, are other activities to support this transition.
